    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()

      • move

        public void move(double newX,
                 double newY)
        The shape takes a new coordinate point and moves there. Could be from mouse(for mines) or for user input with(wasd/arrow keys)
        Parameters:
        newX - New X value assigned
        newY - New Y value assigned

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double xInput,
                             double yInput)
        Checks if the point is inside the shape. Will be used to check collisions
        Parameters:
        xInput - new xCoordinate
        yInput - new y-Coordinate
        Returns:
        if the point is inside the shape

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet surface)
        Draws a new instance of a shape object.
        Parameters:
        surface - used to access the method to draw the shapes
